update t_md_school
SCHOOL_NAME = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERP_CODE = #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

VISIABLE = #{visiable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SCHOOL_CODE = #{schoolCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
